articles.title: About billing for GitHub Codespaces
articles.subtitle: View pricing and see how to manage Codespaces billing for your organization.

articles.title: Enabling Codespaces for your organization
articles.subtitle: You can control which users in your organization can use Codespaces.

articles.title: Configuring Codespaces for your project
articles.subtitle: You can use a devcontainer.json file to define a Codespaces environment for your repository.

articles.title: Managing repository access for your organization's Codespaces
articles.subtitle: You can manage the repositories in your organization that Codespaces can access.
